name: VAIOT
description: VAIOT offers a portfolio of AI-powered Legal Technology and Decentralized Law solutions integrated with AI Multi-Agents and blockchain. These solutions provide businesses and consumers with automated legal support and contracts â€”faster, easier, and more affordable. VAIOT is the creator and operator of products: Legal Torch (https://legaltorch.mt/) and Decentralized Dispute Resolution System (https://ddrs.vaiot.ai/) utilizing AI Legal Multi-Agents technology. VAIOT was founded in 2018, and regulated under the Virtual Financial Assets regulatory framework in Malta since 2020. Our company, the project, and the token offering itself were audited several times, verified, and supervised by Grant Thornton and the Malta Financial Services Authority (MFSA). For more information go to www.VAIOT.ai.
